paper_abstract: We show that enumerating all minimal spanning and connected subsets of a given matroid can be solved in incremental quasipolynomial time. In the special case of graphical matroids, we improve this complexity bound by showing that all minimal 2-vertex connected edge subsets of a given graph can be generated in incremental polynomial time.
paper_title: Enumerating spanning and connected subsets in graphs and matroids
